planOneMonth.title: 30-Day Saudi Arabia Tour • Grand Discovery
planOneMonth.heroSubtitle: A month-long immersion that traces Saudi Arabia's sacred heartlands, modern capitals, Red Sea escapes, and mountain retreats at an unhurried pace.
planOneMonth.planOverviewDesc: Designed for travelers who want to absorb every facet of Saudi Arabia, the 30-day Grand Discovery balances spiritual reflection, cultural depth, and rejuvenating downtime. Each week focuses on a different region, with curated accommodations, guided experiences, and flexible free days to explore independently.
planOneMonth.durationDesc: Four themed weeks with optional rest days built into each stage.
planOneMonth.paceDesc: Alternating immersive excursions with restorative beach and spa time.
planOneMonth.regionsDesc: Makkah, Madinah, Riyadh, AlUla, Red Sea coast, Asir Highlands, and NEOM.
planOneMonth.idealForDesc: Families and cultural travelers seeking authentic encounters plus premium comfort.
planOneMonth.week1Item1: Pilgrimage-inspired stays in Makkah and Madinah
planOneMonth.week1Item2: Guided visits to historic mosques and sacred landmarks
planOneMonth.week1Item3: Evening reflections and traditional Hijazi dining
planOneMonth.week2Item1: Diriyah living history, Riyadh skyline experiences
planOneMonth.week2Item2: AlUla sandstone valleys, Hegra UNESCO explorations
planOneMonth.week2Item3: Hands-on artisan workshops and farm-to-table dinners
planOneMonth.week3Item1: Jeddah Corniche, Red Sea snorkeling, yacht charter options
planOneMonth.week3Item2: NEOM & The Line preview with sustainability showcases
planOneMonth.week3Item3: Wellness retreats and curated sunset gatherings
planOneMonth.week4Item1: Asir mountain villages, cloud forests, and cable car vistas
planOneMonth.week4Item2: Jazan spice markets and Farasan Island marine sanctuary
planOneMonth.week4Item3: Final days for bespoke interests or private desert safari
planOneMonth.inclusion1Desc: Handpicked luxury hotels, boutique eco-lodges, and private villa upgrades with chauffeured ground transfers and optional domestic flights.
planOneMonth.inclusion2Desc: Licensed guides, historians, and local storytellers who unlock the narratives behind sacred sites, UNESCO treasures, and Vision 2030 projects.
planOneMonth.inclusion3Desc: Private majlis dinners, desert stargazing, marine expeditions, and interactive craft ateliers curated to your interests.
planOneMonth.inclusion4Desc: Concierge support for spa appointments, helicopter tours, dining reservations, and additional rest days tailored to your pace.
planOneMonth.ctaDesc: Ready to personalize this 30-day journey? Share your travel dates and group details so our specialists can craft a bespoke itinerary and confirm availability across the Kingdom.

planFourteenDays.title: 14-Day Saudi Highlights • Two-Week Journey
planFourteenDays.heroTitle3: HOLY CITIES • CAPITAL ENERGY • ALULA MAGIC
planFourteenDays.heroSubtitle: Capture Saudi Arabia's most iconic experiences in fourteen days, blending sacred moments, urban discovery, and sandstone wonderlands with expert guidance.
planFourteenDays.planOverviewDesc: This two-week blueprint prioritizes the west and central regions, delivering a dynamic rhythm of pilgrimage, modern city life, and desert heritage. Logistics are streamlined so you can focus on living every moment, from sunrise prayers to evening light shows.
planFourteenDays.durationDesc: Perfectly paced for travelers with limited vacation time.
planFourteenDays.focusDesc: Makkah, Madinah, Riyadh, Diriyah, and AlUla within one seamless route.
planFourteenDays.styleDesc: Daily highlights with evening leisure and optional premium add-ons.
planFourteenDays.idealForDesc: Couples, small groups, and families wanting an executive snapshot of the Kingdom.
planFourteenDays.days1to4Item1: Arrival assistance and settling in Makkah
planFourteenDays.days1to4Item2: Guided ziyarat to key sites in Madinah
planFourteenDays.days1to4Item3: Evening reflections and curated spiritual lectures
planFourteenDays.days5to8Item1: Riyadh skyline tour, Edge of the World excursion
planFourteenDays.days5to8Item2: Diriyah heritage walk and traditional Najdi cuisine
planFourteenDays.days5to8Item3: Optional shopping, spa, or museum experiences
planFourteenDays.days9to11Item1: Hegra UNESCO tour with archaeologist host
planFourteenDays.days9to11Item2: Hot air balloon sunrise or helicopter fly-over
planFourteenDays.days12to14Item2: Snorkeling or island-hopping across the Red Sea
planFourteenDays.days12to14Item3: Farewell dinner featuring contemporary Saudi cuisine
planFourteenDays.inclusion1Desc: Airport meet-and-greet, visa support, business-class domestic flights, and private transfers keep the pace effortless.
planFourteenDays.inclusion2Desc: Dedicated guides in each city provide context, translation, and behind-the-scenes access to cultural showcases.
planFourteenDays.inclusion3Desc: Exclusive evening at Diriyah, AlUla equestrian trails, and Red Sea sunset cruise tailored to your interests.
planFourteenDays.inclusion4Desc: Built-in open slots let you add spa retreats, shopping tours, or extra time for prayer and reflection.
planFourteenDays.ctaDesc: Tell us your preferred travel window and group details so we can confirm availability, reserve top-rated accommodations, and personalize each day's highlights for you.

planTwelveDays.title: 12-Day Saudi Escape • Coastal & Heritage
planTwelveDays.heroSubtitle: An agile twelve-day itinerary combining waterfront relaxation, ancient oasis exploration, and highland adventures with thoughtful cultural immersion.
planTwelveDays.planOverviewDesc: Ideal for travelers seeking a balance of rest and discovery, this 12-day route begins on the Red Sea, transitions through AlUla's dramatic landscapes, and concludes in the cool highlands of Asir. Expect boutique stays, culinary explorations, and flexible daily options.
planTwelveDays.durationDesc: Curated to deliver maximum variety with minimal transit time.
planTwelveDays.highlightsDesc: Red Sea leisure, AlUla heritage, Abha terraces, and Sarawat peaks.
planTwelveDays.travelStyleDesc: Morning explorations paired with afternoons for wellness or downtime.
planTwelveDays.idealForDesc: Groups who crave variety—snorkeling, hiking, art, and gourmet dining.
planTwelveDays.days1to3Item1: Settle into Jeddah waterfront resort with private beach access
planTwelveDays.days1to3Item2: Snorkeling or dive excursions to coral gardens
planTwelveDays.days1to3Item3: Historic Al-Balad evening walk with street-food tasting
planTwelveDays.days4to6Item1: Hegra UNESCO tour, Dadan & Ikmah valley discoveries
planTwelveDays.days4to6Item2: Wellness time at luxury desert camp, spa & infinity pool
planTwelveDays.days4to6Item3: Adventure add-ons: Via Ferrata, zipline, or helicopter vistas
planTwelveDays.days7to9Item1: Highland cable cars, Rijal Alma heritage village
planTwelveDays.days7to9Item2: Cool-climate coffee tastings and local art cooperatives
planTwelveDays.days7to9Item3: Sunrise hikes above the clouds on the Sarawat range
planTwelveDays.days10to12Item1: Optional Farasan Islands extension or spa retreats
planTwelveDays.days10to12Item2: Souvenir markets and culinary finale in Jeddah
planTwelveDays.days10to12Item3: Departure support with VIP airport services
planTwelveDays.enhancement1Desc: Waterfront resorts, desert eco-lodges, and mountain boutiques with daily breakfast and curated dining recommendations.
planTwelveDays.enhancement2Desc: Choice of water sports, guided hikes, art workshops, or culinary classes scheduled around your energy levels.
planTwelveDays.enhancement3Desc: Dedicated travel concierge manages transfers, upgrades, and real-time adjustments.
planTwelveDays.enhancement4Desc: Custom kid-friendly excursions, private guides, and flexible room layouts available on request.
planTwelveDays.ctaDesc: Share your travel goals and preferred experiences so our team can tailor this itinerary—whether you want more relaxation, more adventure, or a bit of both.
